item.title: Deja vu as Spirit and Frontier are reportedly once again discussing a merger
item.description: Frontier and Spirit Airlines are reportedly discussing merging for the third time in as many years, as bankrupt Spirit staves off insolvency.

item.title: United Airlines updates app to include real-time boarding updates, other features
item.description: United Airlines announced an updated version of its app with new features, such as a virtual gate display and lounge recommendations based on realtime...

item.title: My top 4 picks for the best cobranded hotel credit card
item.description: It's worth paying the annual fee on many of the best hotel credit cards. Here's my take on four hotel credit cards that could be named the best.

item.title: JetBlue cuts JFK-Amsterdam route, likely done with European growth 'for a while'
item.description: JetBlue won't bring back service from New York JFK to Amsterdam in 2026, but continues to serve the Netherlands from Boston.

item.title: Chase Sapphire Preferred Card review: A top travel and dining card
item.description: The Chase Sapphire Preferred Card is one of the most popular travel rewards credit cards. We'll help you decide whether it's worth applying for.
